author: Daniel Greene
description:
The biggest fantasy & sci-fi news stories of the week: Big thank you to Flexispot for sponsoring today's video! If you'd like to get your own comfy-cozy Lotus Recliner (manual or electric, in regular fabric or vegan leather) check them out at [https://bit.ly/4n0AlWp] and use my code LOTUS30 to get $30 off your purchase with FREE SHIPPING! Sean Astin becomes SAG-AFTRA president, Henry Cavill injured delaying Highlander, Nintendo’s wild new patent, AI lawsuits, cover reveals, upcoming adaptations, and more!

title: Sean Astin Elected President! • Henry Cavill Injured🤕 • SenLinYu’s CRAZY hype || FN
